name: Departures Bench
description: Cardiff Airport departures bench near WHSmith, background hum of announcements, trolley wheels clattering by.

name: Tarmac
description: Tarmac outside the MyKindOfHolidays passenger plane, golden dawn, cases piled high, conveyor belt rattling.

name: Check-In Desk
description: Check-in desk, MyKindOfHolidays banners sparkling, queue ropes, scent of airport perfume.

name: Staff Room
description: Staff room, battered sofa, staff microwave humming, break time chaos.

name: Taxi Desk

name: Security Lane
description: Security lane, trays clattering, luggage X-ray beeping, queue of impatient holidaymakers.

name: Terminal Entrance
description: Terminal entrance, info board blinking, lost property pile mounting.

name: Duty Free
description: Duty Free perfume counter, bottles everywhere, neon lights, scent cloud thick enough to choke a dragon.

name: Coffee Shop
description: Coffee shop in departures, sticky counter, queue out the door, 'CostaFuckingBomb' apron covered in lipstick smears.

name: Arrivals Concourse
description: Arrivals concourse, under the iconic Cardiff Airport sign, crowds pouring past, the faint whiff of jet fuel and sausage rolls.

name: Plane Steps
description: Battered MyKindOfHolidays plane steps, foot of boarding stairs, sunrise reflecting off the fuselage, air thick with jet fuel.

name: ATC Tower
description: Cardiff Airport air traffic control tower, biscuit crumbs and blinking radar screens, mug of tea, hi-vis half-on, shoes off.
